story.title: Moderation Dashboard & Reporting
story.userStory:
**As a** moderation lead,
**I want** dashboards and reports that track moderation backlog, outcomes, and reviewer performance,
**so that** we can maintain quality and meet SLAs.
acceptanceCriteria: Build a moderation dashboard (Looker Studio or equivalent) pulling data from `moderation_flags`, `moderation_tasks`, and audit logs, showing backlog, resolution times, false positives, and appeals outcomes.
Provide weekly/monthly reports (exportable) summarizing moderation metrics by category, reviewer, and region, highlighting SLA adherence.
Integrate alerts for backlog thresholds, API failure spikes, and repeated false positives to notify moderation team.
Ensure data privacy: dashboards restrict access to authorized roles and anonymize reporter/appeal identifiers where needed.
Tests/verification include data accuracy checks, dashboard refresh validation, and alert simulation.

subtasks.title: Set up dashboard with key KPIs and drilldowns.
Confirm data refresh frequency and access controls.
Create export scripts/queries for weekly/monthly summaries.
Configure alerts for backlog thresholds, false positives.
Enforce role-based access; anonymize sensitive fields.
Manual spot checks of dashboard data vs raw sources.

Security: Role-based access; ensure compliance with privacy policies.
Testing Requirements: Manual verification, automated queries, alert testing.

testing: Spot checks and scripted validation for dashboard/report accuracy.
